entity.name: Ilhan Omar
entity.description: US Representative from Minnesota, Ilhan Omar (MN-5)

text:
President Trump says @IlhanMN wants to turn the US into Somalia...a country she fled as a refugee.

Important to note the president is attacking Congresswoman Omar just four days after her father passed away due to coronavirus complications.
